document.discussion_title: Derwent London Plc (DLN) Rating Lowered to Add at Numis Securities Ltd
document.topic_text: Tweet Numis Securities Ltd cut shares of Derwent London Plc (LON:DLN) to an add rating in a research report sent to investors on Tuesday. They currently have GBX 3,164 ($40.74) price target on the real estate investment trust’s stock, down from their previous price target of GBX 3,850 ($49.58). DLN has been the topic of a number of other reports. Liberum Capital reissued a hold rating and set a GBX 2,500 ($32.19) target price on shares of Derwent London Plc in a report on Monday, August 15th. BNP Paribas restated an underperform rating and set a GBX 2,340 ($30.13) price target on shares of Derwent London Plc in a research report on Friday, August 12th. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. restated a hold rating and set a GBX 2,950 ($37.99) price target on shares of Derwent London Plc in a research report on Friday, August 12th. Societe Generale lowered their price target on shares of Derwent London Plc from GBX 3,570 ($45.97) to GBX 2,820 ($36.31) and set a hold rating for the company in a research report on Tuesday, July 5th. Finally, Jefferies Group lowered their price target on shares of Derwent London Plc from GBX 3,055 ($39.34) to GBX 2,950 ($37.99) and set a hold rating for the company in a research report on Thursday, April 21st. Two research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, ten have issued a hold rating and seven have given a buy rating to the company. The stock currently has an average rating of Hold and an average price target of GBX 3,337.35 ($42.97). In other news, insider Burns,John David sold 45,000 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction dated Wednesday, June 22nd. The shares were sold at an average price of GBX 3,308 ($42.60), for a total transaction of £1,488,600 ($1,916,816.89). Also, insider Fraser,Simon acquired 2,000 shares of Derwent London Plc stock in a transaction dated Friday, June 24th. The shares were acquired at an average price of GBX 2,818 ($36.29) per share, with a total value of £56,360 ($72,572.75). Derwent London Plc ( LON:DLN ) opened at 2706.00 on Tuesday. The firm’s 50-day moving average is GBX 2,720.03 and its 200-day moving average is GBX 3,041.67. The firm’s market cap is GBX 3.01 billion. Derwent London Plc has a 12 month low of GBX 2,230.00 and a 12 month high of GBX 3,891.00. The firm also recently disclosed a dividend, which will be paid on Friday, October 21st. Stockholders of record on Thursday, September 15th will be given a dividend of GBX 13.86 ($0.18) per share. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, September 15th. This represents a dividend yield of 0.51%. Derwent London plc is a United Kingdom-based real estate investment trust (REIT) operating in central London region. The Company owns and manages a portfolio of approximately 6.2 million square feet located in over 15 villages in London’s West End and City borders and focus on middle market rents. The Company’s property portfolio includes investment property, owner-occupied property and trading property. Derwent London Plc Derwent London Plc
